data.name: Mythic Archive - Host License
data.detailed_description:
Mythic Archive - Host License

The host copy of Mythic Archive allows you to save your work in mythic archive, opening up the possibilities of system building, content creation and campaign management! It also provides the tools to share content on the Steam workshop!


Provides the following functionality
  • Saves your projects, files, maps and other content to your local computer
  • Packaging tools for packing up your content for backups and the workshop
  • Individual Permission management for each of your players
  • API tools for importing content in bulk
